title: Which technologies should I learn as a fresher if I am joining Cognizant, through campus recruitment? - Quora

response.answer_text: It won't be relevant to lean any new technology at the moment ,as cognizant will train you with the Tech that is under requirement . However if you are inclined towards any technology , my suggestion is go for Cloud computing or Hadoop , once you are done with the training , look for jobs online related to your tech.

Hi, There is nothing in particular which you should learn before joining. Because, during training you will be trained on specific technologies as per companies requirement. It can be .Net, Java, HTML, Web, etc. But, if you want and if you have time, you can learn C and MySql because this two remains common in most of the trainings. Hope this helps. Thanks for asking. All the very best!!
